meanings.definition: A Middle Eastern salad typically made with bulgur, tomatoes, parsley, mint, onion, and lemon juice.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a refreshing bowl of tabbouleh for lunch.
meanings.sent2: She added extra parsley to the tabbouleh for more flavor.
meanings.sent3: The tabbouleh danced with freshness on my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The vibrant colors of the tabbouleh resembled a garden on a plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the tabbouleh filled the room, enticing everyone to try a bite.

meanings.sent1: We will tabbouleh together for the picnic.
meanings.sent2: He tabboulehed quickly before heading out.
meanings.sent3: Don't forget to tabbouleh before the guests arrive!
meanings.sent4: She tabboulehed with such finesse, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent5: Tabbouleh slowly to savor each bite of the delicious salad.
